@JBLascarrou @strachanjamie @iceman_ex https://t.co/XG4rWEiq5K and https://t.co/damTuUnGJr
@iceman_ex We tend to use ~5cm in fully vent to prevent dynamic airway collapse. Higher levels often needed in spont modes.
@iceman_ex Brochard wrote nice articles on PEEP in obstructive conditions. In PS/NIV, offset iPEEP to allow triggering: not req if mand vent
@iceman_ex @strachanjamie @bigcatdoc No barotrauma but mainly using CPAP. Main effect is offsetting inspiratory threshold load not fatigue.
@strachanjamie @bigcatdoc Strongly disagree. Our case series of >150 including low gcs with good outcomes, short Los, low intubation rates.
@StevenShorrock Well done, look forward to reading.
So, the guy who continuously lies, doesn't believe in climate change and has been called unqualified by his own party is ahead. Thanks guys.
